title: TVS Motor posts 25% increase in sales in April over corresponding period last year
description: TVS Motor reported a 25% increase in April sales, selling 3,83,615 units compared to 3,06,224 units last year. Two-wheeler sales surged by 27%, with domestic sales up 29%. Motorcycle sales grew by 24%, while scooter sales rose by 34%. However, three-wheeler sales declined. Electric vehicle sales soared to 17,403 units.
